textBeforeTable: June Stay Connected Exhibition sponsorship at MOPA also offers significant philanthropic and marketing opportunities. It allows you to support a major San Diego cultural institution and to receive substantial exposure and acknowledgment, as well as a tax benefit. For more information on supporting MOPA’s upcoming exhibitions, please contact Selina Hudgins (619.238.7559 x300) or make a donation. MOPA is a center for visual learning, passionately dedicated to sharing and exploring the universal language of photography. Your support will help us fulfill our ambitious mission and create exhibitions that inspire, educate and inform the San Diego community and visitors from around the world.  Support Exhibitions at MOPA Exhibitions   The San Diego Foundation informs and inspires those wishing to endow their passions for the future of the San Diego region.
